omni-tool: Biotic Burst: On a successful melee attack, the target takes 1d6 force damage and is pushed backward 3m.
weapon: Choose one from Heavy Pistol, SMG
skill: Choose three from Acrobatics, Insight, Intimidation, Medicine, Perception, Sleight of Hand, Stealth, and Survival
description: Adepts are biotic specialists, capable of disabling and killing enemies with raw biotic power. While they lack advanced combat training, they are the best at defeating enemies without firing a shot. They are outfitted with L5x implants that can spawn a micro-singularity, damaging enemies and pulling them into the air.

omni-tool: Backhand: On a successful melee attack, the creature takes 1d8 fire damage.
weapon: Choose one from Heavy Pistol, SMG
skill: Choose three skills from Athletics, Hacking, History, Investigation, Medicine, Nature, Perception, and Piloting
description: Engineers are tech specialists, the only class able to employ combat drones on the battlefield. Engineers are the most effective class at blasting through enemy defenses and disabling opponents.

omni-tool: Omni-taser: On a successful melee attack, the target takes 1d6 lightning damage.
weapon: Choose one from Heavy Pistols, SMGs, Sniper Rifles
skill: Choose three from Acrobatics, Deception, Hacking, History, Investigation, Piloting, Sleight of Hand, and Stealth.
description: Infiltrators are tech and combat specialists with the unique ability to cloak themselves from visual and technological detection. Deadly at any range, Infiltrators are equipped with a wide variety of weapons, equipment and powers that can take down any enemy.

omni-tool: Dual omni-blade: On a successful melee attack, the target takes 1d10 slashing damage.
weapon: Choose one from Assault Rifles, Heavy Pistols, SMGs
skill: Choose three from Athletics, Insight, Intimidation, Medicine, Perception, Performance, Persuasion, Survival
description: Sentinels are unique, bringing both tech and biotic abilities to the battlefield. In addition to complete weapons training, Sentinels are equipped with an advanced shield that makes taking cover much less necessary and rushing their enemies much more productive.

omni-tool: Omni-blade. +2 to melee attack rolls. On a successful melee attack, target takes 1d10 puncture damage.
weapon: Choose two from Assault Rifles, Heavy Pistols, Shotguns, SMGs, Sniper Rifles
skill: Choose three from Acrobatics, Athletics, Intimidation, Medicine, Persuasion, Piloting, Stealth, and Survival
description: Soldiers are pure combat specialists. No one is tougher or more effective at taking down enemies with gunfire. Soldiers have the most thorough weapons training and can use all special ammo types. High-level operatives are outfitted with ocular synaptic processors that allow them to focus on targets with lethal accuracy.

omni-tool: Biotic Punch:  Dash forward 5m, then make a melee attack. On a success, deal 1d8 force damage and gain 1 Barrier Tick.
weapon: Choose one from Heavy Pistols, Shotguns, SMGs
skill: Choose three from Acrobatics, Athletics, Deception, Intimidation, Performance, Persuasion, Sleight of Hand, Stealth, Survival
description: Vanguards are feared for their high-risk high-reward combat style, closing quickly on enemies and destroying them at close range with weapons and biotic abilities. They are outfitted with L5n implants, enabling them to perform a biotic charge that strikes the opponent with incredible force while bringing the Vanguard in close for close-range combat.
